description: Demolition of existing petrol station (Class Sui-Generis) and redevelopment of the site including erection of a 4-7 storey building to provide 71 self-contained residential units (Class C3) (22 x 1 bedrooms, 41 x 2 bedrooms, 8 x 3 bedrooms) with associated cycle parking and landscaping.
